subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Angels are cruising to another division title, but their postseason hopes could hinge on how quickly Scot Shields, below, can straighten himself out. Shields, a key bridge to closer Francisco Rodríguez, was demoted from his eighth-inning setup role after posting an earned run average of more than 15.00 for the past three weeks. The team has blamed a mechanical problem for his struggles.
